cards.title: Captain Phasma- Elite Trooper
cards.text: Your non-unique characters have the Guardian keyword.

cards.title: First Order Stormtrooper
cards.text: Members of this new generation of stormtroopers are trained from birth and fed a steady diet of First Order propaganda to ensure absolute loyalty.

cards.title: General Grievous - Jedi Hunter
cards.text: Before an opponent's character is defeated, you may move one of their non-ability upgrades to this character.

cards.title: General Veers- Field Commander
cards.text: Action- Remove this die to turn one of your support dice to any side.

cards.title: AT-ST
cards.text: Special - Discard a support from play.

cards.title: First Order TIE Fighter
cards.text: Special - Remove all shield from all of an opponent's characters.

cards.title: Commanding Presence
cards.text: Red character only. Special - Choose a Red die. If it is your die, resolve it, increasing its value by 2. If it is an opponent's die, remove it.

cards.title: F-11D Rifle
cards.text: Redeploy. Special - Force an opponent to deal 2 damage to their characters, distributing the damage as they wish.

cards.title: Count Dooku - Devious Strategist
cards.text: Before this character is dealt 1 or more damage, you may discard a card from your hand to give him 1 shield.

cards.title: Darth Vader- Sith Lord
cards.text: After you activate this character you may force an opponent to choose and discard a card from their hand.

cards.title: Kylo Ren- Vader's Disciple
cards.text: Special - Choose an opponent's character. Then look at a random card in that opponent's hand and deal damage to that character equal to the cost of the card you just looked at.

cards.title: Nightsister
cards.text: Action- Remove a die. Deal 1 damage to this character.

cards.title: Force Choke
cards.text: Blue character only. Special - Deal 1 unblockable damage to another character. Then you may turn one of its character or upgrade dice to any side.

cards.title: Immobilize
cards.text: Blue character only. Action- Remove this die to turn a die to a side showing a blank.

cards.title: Kylo Ren's Lightsaber
cards.text: Blue character only. Special - Deal 2 damage to a character. If any of this damage is blocked by shields, reroll this die instead of removing it from your pool.

cards.title: Sith Holocron
cards.text: Special - Switch this upgrade with a Blue ability upgrade in your hand, ignoring its play restrictions. Then you may spend 1 resource to roll its die into your pool, if able.

cards.title: Infantry Grenades
cards.text: Special - Deal 2 damage to each of an opponent's characters. Discard this upgrade from play.

cards.title: Speeder Bike Scout
cards.text: Special - Remove a die. You may take one additional action.

cards.title: Bala-Tik - Gang Leader
cards.text: After an opponent's character is defeated, you may ready this character.

cards.title: Jabba the Hutt - The Great and Mighty
cards.text: After you activate this character, you may reroll a Yellow die.

cards.title: Jango Fett- Lethal Mercenary
cards.text: After an opponent activates a character, you may activate this character.

cards.title: Tusken Raider
cards.text: After you activate this character, you may discard a card from your hand to resolve one of its character or upgrade dice.

cards.title: Crime Lord
cards.text: Special - Spend 5 resources to choose a character. That character is defeated after this round ends.

cards.title: Flame Thrower
cards.text: Special - Deal 1 damage each to up to 3 different characters.

cards.title: Gaffi Stick
cards.text: Redeploy. Special - Remove one of your dice showing melee damage to deal 3 damage to a character.

cards.title: On the Hunt
cards.text: Special - Remove all shields from a character. You may spend 1 resource to remove one of its character or upgrade dice.

cards.title: Admiral Ackbar- Perceptive Tactician
cards.text: After an opponent plays or discards the last card from their hand, they choose and deal 2 damage to one of their characters.

cards.title: Leia Organa- Born Leader
cards.text: Action - Remove this die to reroll up to 2 of your dice.

cards.title: Poe Dameron- Ace Pilot
cards.text: Special - Discard a card from your hand to resolve one of the sides of its die, if able. Then, if it was a vehicle card, you may pay its cost to play it from your discard pile.

cards.title: Rebel Trooper
cards.text: Guardian

cards.title: Launch Bay
cards.text: The X on this die is equal to the number of cards in your hand.

cards.title: Black One
cards.text: Special - Deal 1 damage to a character. Reroll this die instead of removing it from your pool.

cards.title: Scout
cards.text: Look at an opponent's hand and discard the cheapest card from it (you choose in the case of a tie).

cards.title: Survival Gear
cards.text: To hide from the Empire, the rebels must often brave harsh environments.

cards.title: Luke Skywalker - Jedi Knight
cards.text: After you activate this character, draw a card.

cards.title: Padawan
cards.text: While this character does not have an upgrade, the cost to attach a weapon to it is decreased by 1.

cards.title: Qui-Gon Jinn- Ataru Master
cards.text: Before this character gains 1 or more shields, you may remove 1 of his shields to deal 1 damage to a character.

cards.title: Rey - Force Prodigy
cards.text: After you play an upgrade on this character, you may take one additional action.

cards.title: Force Protection
cards.text: Blue character only. Special - Give 3 shields to your characters, distributed as you wish.

cards.title: Jedi Robes
cards.text: After you play this upgrade, give attached character 1 shield, or 2 shields instead in the first round of play.

cards.title: Luke Skywalker's Lightsaber
cards.text: Special - Give a character 2 shields or deal 2 unblockable damage to a character.

cards.title: One with The Force
cards.text: Blue character only. Before attached character is defeated, this upgrade becomes a support for the rest of the game (it starts ready).

cards.title: BB-8
cards.text: Special - Reroll this die and one of your other dice. Do not remove this die from your pool after resolving this ability.

cards.title: Rey's Staff
cards.text: Special - Remove a die showing damage.

cards.title: Finn- First Order Defector
cards.text: You can attach any weapon to this character, ignoring play restrictions. You can include Red Villain weapons and vehicles in your deck.

cards.title: Han Solo- Scoundrel
cards.text: After you play a card with the Ambush keyword, you may give this character 1 shield.

cards.title: Hired Gun
cards.text: 'You needn't worry about your reward. If money is all that you love, then that's what you'll receive.' Leia Organa

cards.title: Padme Amidala- Queen of Naboo
cards.text: Special - Discard the top card of an opponent's deck or spend 1 resource to discard the top 2 cards of an opponent's deck.

cards.title: Millennium Falcon
cards.text: Special - Play a Yellow event from your discard pile or hand for free.

cards.title: Diplomatic Immunity
cards.text: The shields from this die can be given to any of your characters distributed as you wish.

cards.title: DL-44 Heavy Blaster Pistol
cards.text: Ambush. After you play this upgrade, force an opponent to choose and remove one of their dice.

cards.title: Infiltrate
cards.text: Special - Reroll up to 2 of an opponent's dice.

cards.title: Outpost
cards.text: Special - Resolve the battlefield ability as if you had just claimed it.

cards.title: DH-17 Blaster Pistol
cards.text: The weapon of choice for rebel soldiers and imperial officers alike during the Galactic Civil War.

cards.title: IQA-11 Blaster Rifle
cards.text: Special - Deal 2 unblockable damage to a character.

cards.title: Promotion
cards.text: Red character only. After you play this upgrade, you may draw a card.

cards.title: Force Throw
cards.text: Special - Blue Character Only.  Remove a die to deal a character damage equal to the value showing on that die (specials and blanks are zeroes).

cards.title: Force Training
cards.text: To play, spot a Blue character.  Special - Choose and do two of the following: deal 1 damage to a character, or gain 1 resource, or give a character 1 shield.

cards.title: Lightsaber
cards.text: Redeploy. Special - Deal 2 unblockable damage to a character.

cards.title: Mind Probe
cards.text: Blue Character only. Special - Deal an opponent's character 1 damage for each card in that opponent's hand.

cards.title: Comlink
cards.text: After you play this upgrade, you may reroll any number of your dice or any number of an opponent's dice.

cards.title: Datapad
cards.text: Special - Turn one of your dice to a side not showing damage.

cards.title: Holdout Blaster
cards.text: Ambush. Redeploy.

cards.title: Black Market
cards.text: Special - Draw 2 cards. You may play an upgrade from your hand, decreasing its cost by 1.

cards.title: Cunning
cards.text: Yellow character only. Special  - Resolve a special ability on another card in play as if it were your card.

cards.title: Jetpack
cards.text: Special - Remove a die showing melee damage and give attached character 1 shield.

cards.title: Thermal Detonator
cards.text: To play, spot a Yellow character. Special  - Deal 3 damage to each of an opponent's characters. Discard this upgrade from play.

cards.title: Cannon Fodder
cards.text: Deal one of your non-unique characters damage equal to the value of an opponent's die showing damage. Then remove that die.

cards.title: Closing the Net
cards.text: Force an opponent to choose and remove one of their dice. You may place this event on the bottom of your deck instead of discarding it.

cards.title: Endless Ranks
cards.text: Return one of your defeated non-unique Red characters to the game with no damage on it.

cards.title: Occupation
cards.text: Play only if you control the battlefield. Force an opponent to lose all of their resources.

cards.title: Probe
cards.text: Look at two random cards from your opponent's hand. Discard any of these cards that are events.

cards.title: Sweep the Area
cards.text: Count the number of ready Red characters you have. Reroll that many of an opponent's dice.

cards.title: Tactical Mastery
cards.text: Spot a Red character to take up to 2 additional actions.

cards.title: The Best Defense...
cards.text: Deal one of your Red characters 3 damage to remove up to 2 of an opponent's dice.

cards.title: Drudge Work
cards.text: Action- Exhaust this support and one of your characters to gain 1 resource.

cards.title: Local Garrison
cards.text: Each opponent gains 1 fewer resource during each upkeep phase to a minimum of 1.

cards.title: Personal Escort
cards.text: Attached character has theGuardiankeyword.

cards.title: Abandon All Hope
cards.text: Force an opponent to choose to either lose all of their resources or discard all cards in their hand.

cards.title: Boundless Ambition
cards.text: Draw cards up to your hand size.

cards.title: Enrage
cards.text: Deal 1 damage to one of your Blue characters to gain 1 resource.

cards.title: Feel Your Anger
cards.text: Count the number of blanks showing on an opponent's dice. Remove that many of their dice.

cards.title: Force Strike
cards.text: Turn one of your blue dice to the side showing melee damage, then you may resolve it immediately.

cards.title: Intimidate
cards.text: Remove all shields from a character.

cards.title: Isolation
cards.text: Spot a Blue character to remove a character die.

cards.title: No Mercy
cards.text: Discard any number of Blue cards from your hand. Then resolve one of your dice showing damage, increasing its value by 1 for each card you just discarded.

cards.title: Pulling the Strings
cards.text: Look at the top 3 cards of any deck. Then place those cards on the top and/or bottom of that deck in any order.

cards.title: Emperor's Favor
cards.text: Your hand size is increased by 1.

cards.title: Power of the Dark Side
cards.text: Action- Exhaust this support to reroll one of your dice. If that die rolls a blank, deal 2 unblockable damage to a character.

cards.title: Hidden In Shadow
cards.text: Action - If the character this card is attached to does not have any shields, you can exhaust this card to place one shield on that character.

cards.title: Nowhere to Run
cards.text: Turn each of your dice showing a blank to any side.

cards.title: Ace in the Hole
cards.text: Discard a Yellow upgrade from your hand to roll its die into your pool, if able. Set aside that die after it is resolved or removed.

cards.title: Armed to the Teeth
cards.text: Discard any number of upgrades from one of your Yellow characters. Then deal damage to a character equal to the number of upgrades you just discarded.

cards.title: Confiscation
cards.text: Spend resources equal to the cost of an opponent's upgrade in play to return that upgrade to their hand.

cards.title: Fight Dirty
cards.text: Remove any number of your Yellow dice. Then deal damage to a character equal to the number of dice you just removed.

cards.title: Go for the Kill
cards.text: Resolve one of your dice showing ranged damage, treating this damage as unblockable.

cards.title: He Doesn't Like You
cards.text: Remove one of your dice to remove an opponent's die.

cards.title: Lying in Wait
cards.text: Force an opponent to discard cards from their hand, until they hold the same amount of cards as you do.

cards.title: Backup Muscle
cards.text: When you play this card place three single damage tokens on it. Action - Exhaust this card to move one damage token from it to an opponent's character of your choice.

cards.title: My Kind of Scum
cards.text: After you resolve a die showing disrupt, you may exhaust this support to gain resources equal to the number of resources your opponent just lost.

cards.title: Underworld Connections
cards.text: Action - Exhaust this support to gain 1 resource

cards.title: Prized Possession
cards.text: After you play this upgrade, you may remove an opponent's character die and place it here. It is not rolled by any character and does not return to its character unless this upgrade leaves play.

cards.title: Commando Raid
cards.text: Resolve one of your Red dice showing discard, increasing its value by 2. Then draw a card.

cards.title: Defensive Position
cards.text: Play only if you control the battlefield. Remove all of an opponent's dice showing a value of 2 or higher.

cards.title: Field Medic
cards.text: Remove 2 damage from a character.

cards.title: Hit and Run
cards.text: Ambush. Activate one of your Red characters.

cards.title: It's a Trap!
cards.text: Ambush. Choose a symbol showing on an opponent's die. Then turn any number of your Red dice to sides showing that symbol.

cards.title: Natural Talent
cards.text: Resolve one of your dice, increasing its value by 1.

cards.title: Rearm
cards.text: Play a Red upgrade from your discard pile, decreasing its cost by 1.

cards.title: Retreat
cards.text: Your opponent may take 1 action. Then end the action phase.

cards.title: Strategic Planning
cards.text: Ready or exhaust a support.

cards.title: Surgical Strike
cards.text: Remove any number of your Red dice showing ranged damage, increasing each of their values by 1, to discard a support from play that costs equal to or less than the combined value of those dice.

cards.title: Resistance HQ
cards.text: Action - Exhaust this support and discard a card from your hand to give a character 1 shield. Then ready this support unless an opponent spends 1 resource.

cards.title: Anticipate
cards.text: Force an opponent to choose and resolve any number of their dice in the order of their choice. Then remove all of their dice they did not resolve.

cards.title: Defensive Stance
cards.text: Give a character 2 shields.

cards.title: Force Misdirection
cards.text: Choose a symbol showing on one of your Blue dice. Then remove all of an opponent's dice showing that symbol.

cards.title: Heroism
cards.text: Deal one of your unique characters damage equal to the value of an opponent's die showing damage. Then remove that die.

cards.title: Noble Sacrifice
cards.text: Defeat one of your Blue characters to exhaust a character.

cards.title: Patience
cards.text: Remove any number of your dice. Then discard cards from the top of an opponent's deck equal to the number of dice you just removed.

cards.title: Return of the Jedi
cards.text: Add a blue event from your discard pile to your hand.

cards.title: Riposte
cards.text: Remove any number of shields from one of your characters. Then deal damage to a character equal to the number of shields you just removed.

cards.title: Willpower
cards.text: Move 1 damage from one of your exhausted characters to an opponent's exhausted character (this ignores shields).

cards.title: Jedi Council
cards.text: Action - Exhaust this support to look at the top 2 cards of a player's deck. Then you may discard one of those cards and have that player draw the other.

cards.title: Awakening
cards.text: Action - Exhaust this support to resolve one of your dice showing a modified side (a side with a +) as if it was not modified (did not have the +).

cards.title: The Force is Strong
cards.text: Action - Exhaust this support and discard a Blue card from your hand to play another copy of that card from your hand for free.

cards.title: Daring Escape
cards.text: Ambush. Reroll any number of an opponent's dice. Then remove all of their dice showing blanks.

cards.title: Don't Get Cocky
cards.text: Each player draws 2 cards.

cards.title: Draw Attention
cards.text: Move up to 2 damage from one of your characters to another one of your characters (this ignores shields).

cards.title: Hyperspace Jump
cards.text: End the action phase. You may switch the battlefield with the battlefield that is not being used.

cards.title: Let The Wookie Win
cards.text: Force an opponent to choose to either deal one of their exhausted characters 2 damage or choose and remove 2 of their dice.

cards.title: Negotiate
cards.text: Remove one of your character dice to force an opponent to choose and remove 2 of their dice.

cards.title: Scavenge
cards.text: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck. Then you may add an upgrade or support from your discard pile to your hand.

cards.title: Shoot First
cards.text: Resolve one of your Yellow dice showing ranged damage. Then remove an opponent's die showing ranged damage.

cards.title: Smuggling
cards.text: Spot a Yellow character and discard a card from your hand to gain 1 resource.

cards.title: Play the Odds
cards.text: Action- Exhaust this support to reroll one of your Yellow dice. If it rolls a resource, gain 1 resource.

cards.title: Street Informants
cards.text: Action- Exhaust this support to look at an opponent's hand.

cards.title: Second Chance
cards.text: Yellow character only. Before attached character would be defeated, instead heal 5 damage from it and discard this upgrade from play.

cards.title: Award Ceremony
cards.text: Spot a Red character to draw cards equal to the number of exhausted characters you have.

cards.title: Dug in
cards.text: Play only if you control the battlefield. Give 3 shields to your characters, distributed as you wish.

cards.title: Firepower
cards.text: Resolve one of your Red dice showing ranged damage, increasing its value by 1, or by 2 instead if you are resolving a vehicle die.

cards.title: Leadership
cards.text: Exhaust one of your unique Red characters to ready another character.

cards.title: Logistics
cards.text: Spot a red character to resolve a die with the resource symbol, increasing its value by 1.

cards.title: Squad Tactics
cards.text: Activate any number of your non-unique characters at once.

cards.title: Supporting Fire
cards.text: Action- Exhaust this support to resolve one of your dice showing ranged damage, increasing its value by 1.

cards.title: Deflect
cards.text: Spot a Blue character to remove a die showing ranged damage and deal half of that damage, rounded up, to a character.

cards.title: Disturbance in the Force
cards.text: Reroll all dice.

cards.title: Mind Trick
cards.text: Spot a Blue character to force your opponent to split their dice pool into 2 groups of any size. Choose 1 group and remove all dice in it.

cards.title: The Power of the Force
cards.text: Resolve one of your dice, treating its value as equal to the number of Blue upgrades you have in play.

cards.title: Use The Force
cards.text: Spot a Blue character to turn a die to any side.

cards.title: It Binds All Things
cards.text: Before you play a Blue upgrade, you may exhaust this support to decrease its cost by 1.

cards.title: Aim
cards.text: Turn one of your dice to a side showing ranged damage.

cards.title: All In
cards.text: Resolve any number of your dice in the order of your choice.

cards.title: Block
cards.text: Remove all of an opponent's dice showing melee damage.

cards.title: Close Quarters Assault
cards.text: Count the number of dice you have showing melee damage. Discard that many random cards from an opponent's hand.

cards.title: Dodge
cards.text: Remove all of an opponent's dice showing ranged damage.

cards.title: Flank
cards.text: Play only if you have more ready characters than an opponent. Remove one of that opponent's dice.

cards.title: Take Cover
cards.text: Give a character 1 shield.

cards.title: Disarm
cards.text: Remove one of your dice showing damage to discard a weapon or equipment from play that costs equal to or less than the value of that die.

cards.title: Electroshock
cards.text: Spot a Yellow character to remove a die showing a value of 2 or lower.

cards.title: Reversal
cards.text: Spot a Yellow character to remove a die showing damage and deal that damage to a character.

cards.title: Scramble
cards.text: Spot a Yellow character to reroll all of an opponent's dice.

cards.title: Unpredictable
cards.text: Ambush. Reroll a die (yours or an opponent's).

cards.title: Infamous
cards.text: Before you play a Yellow card, you may exhaust this support to give it the Ambush keyword.

cards.title: Hunker Down
cards.text: If attached character takes melee damage, discard this upgrade. Action - Exhaust this upgrade to give attached character 1 shield.

cards.title: Command Center- Lothal
cards.text: Claim - Each opponent discards the top 2 cards of their

cards.title: Echo Base- Hoth
cards.text: Claim - Give a character 1 shield.

cards.title: Emperor's Throne Room- Death Star II
cards.text: Claim - Turn one of your dice to a side showing a special ability. Then you may resolve that die.

cards.title: Frozen Wastes- Starkiller Base
cards.text: Claim- Remove one character die.

cards.title: Imperial Armory- Death Star
cards.text: Claim- Play an upgrade from your hand, decreasing its cost by 1.

cards.title: Jedi Temple- Coruscant
cards.text: Claim- Look at an opponent's hand and discard up to 2 events of your choice from it.

cards.title: Rebel War Room- Yavin IV
cards.text: Claim- Resolve one of your dice. If it has a resource cost, you do not have to pay it.

cards.title: Mos Eisley Spaceport- Tatooine
cards.text: Claim- Return one of your upgrades in play to your hand to gain 1 resource.

cards.title: Separatist Base- Mustafar
cards.text: Claim- Each opponent chooses and deals 1 unblockable damage to one of their characters.

cards.title: Starship Graveyard- Jakku
cards.text: Claim- Choose a support or upgrade in your discard pile and place it on top of your deck.
